text: ql lahum -ayha alrswl-: hal min alihatakum wmebwdatkm man yabda khalq 'ayu shay' min ghyr asl, thuma yfnyh baed 'inshayh, thuma yueiduh khyyth qabl 'an yfnyh? fa'iinahum laa yaqdirun ealaa daewaa dhlk, qul -ayha alrswl-: allah taealaa wahdah hu aldhy yunashiy alkhalq thuma yfnyh thuma yeydh, fkyf tnsrfwn ean tariq alhaqu 'iilaa albatl, wahu eibadat ghyr allh?
